/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on disaster income exclusions, including
proceeds of casualty insurance received
prior to February 2, 2013
, and
on or after February 2, 2013
, and
disaster relief payments
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
